item.title: Breakfast_burrito
item.description: INGREDIENTS: Bacon, Egg, & Cheese Burrito: 3 Tbsp (42 g) Unsalted Butter 8 Eggs Salt Pepper 6-8 Slices of Thick Bacon (optionally chopped) Grated Cheddar Pico: 1 Large Red Tomato, diced 1 Jalapeno, diced 1/2 Sweet Onion, finely diced A handful of Cilantro, chopped 1 lime, juice & zest Olive Oil Salt Pepper Hash Browns (optional): 2 large Russet Potatoes, peeled and grated Oil (or butter) Steak & Cheese Burrito Ingredients
